text: ovun kerehi (mema dharmaya) samudīraṇaya kara penvanu læbuvahot eyaṭa ovun “meyada api viśvāsa karannemu. niyata vaśayenma meyada apagē deviyangē sannidhānayen pæmiṇi satya (dharmaya) vannēya. mīṭa pera niyata vaśayenma api (meya apagē dharmaya magin dænagena, sampūrṇayenma avanata vū) muslimvarun vaśayen siṭiyemu” yayi pavasannāha
